founder.bio: A global consultant based in Fukuoka, specializing in supporting retailers and manufacturers with operational efficiency, sales channel development, and market expansion through AI utilization, data analytics, and global strategies. Leveraging hands-on experience across China, Southeast Asia (Vietnam, Cambodia, Myanmar), and Europe (UK, Italy, France), he provides globally minded and practical support that drives measurable results.

milestones.title: Graduated from Bunka Fashion College / Professional Experience in Asia & Europe

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Data Protection & Information Security
meta.description: Global Genex Inc. privacy policy explaining how we collect, use, protect, and manage personal information. Learn about our commitment to data security and privacy protection.

overview.title: Introduction
content: Global Genex Inc. ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
By using our services, you agree to this policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide when you:

usage.title: Usage & Cookies
usage.description: We may collect usage data (e.g., pages visited, browser type) and use cookies or similar technologies to improve our services. You can control cookie settings in your browser, but disabling cookies may limit certain features.

usage.title: How We Use Information
content: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Respond to inquiries and support requests
Send administrative or marketing communications (with consent)
Analyze usage to enhance user experience and security

sharing.title: Sharing & Disclosure
content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it with service providers who assist our operations, in connection with business transfers, or when required by law. We take reasonable measures to ensure appropriate safeguards.

security.title: Data Security & Retention
content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect information. We retain personal information only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy or as required by law, after which we delete or anonymize it.

transfers.title: International Transfers
content: Your information may be processed in countries other than your own. We ensure such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and include appropriate safeguards.

rights.title: Your Rights

items.title: Access
items.description: Request access to your personal information

items.title: Deletion
items.description: Request deletion of your personal information

items.title: Portability
items.description: Request a copy in a structured format

items.title: Restriction/Objection
items.description: Request restriction or object to processing

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us using the details below. We will respond within a reasonable timeframe in accordance with applicable laws.

children.title: Children's Privacy
content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18. If we become aware that we collected information from a child under 18, we will delete it promptly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions, concerns, or requests about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact:

〒812-0011 1-23-2 Hakata Ekimae, Hakata-ku, Fukuoka, Japan

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will post the updated policy and revise the "Last updated" date above. Your continued use constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
